title: Aid workers scramble to save Haiti earthquake victims as Grace regains tropical storm status
content:
1. Aid workers scramble to save Haiti earthquake victims as Grace regains tropical storm status  The Washington Post
  2. Haitians, searching for survivors with hands and shovels, hope for more rescue help  Miami Herald
  3. Haitians hunker down as Tropical Storm Grace hits  Reuters
  4. Tropical Storm Grace causes flooding in hard-hit Haiti, sets sights on Mexico  Axios
  5. Haiti Hit By Serious Storm After Deadly Earthquake  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: グレイスが熱帯性暴風雨に戻ったため、援助者がハイチ地震の被災者を救うために奔走。
格蕾丝恢复热带风暴状态，援助人员争相拯救海地地震受害者
格蕾絲恢復熱帶風暴狀態，援助人員爭相拯救海地地震受害者
